Review

In 2016, Candy and Jonty helped me turn my passion into a career. We brainstormed together and got all my ideas out on paper which was the beginning of my fitness business, CazFit. (I still have that piece of paper we scribbled all my ideas on.) They also did some corporate branding for me (I have 4 pages of different logo designs she helped me with, they also designed my double-sided business cards and my invoice template).
Their work ethic went above and beyond my expectations, and Candy made herself available to my requests at all hours.
I also hired them to consult me with my social media pages. After helping me setup my business Facebook page and Instagram page, they taught me the basics of social media management so I have been able to manage my accounts myself.
Their service really is incredible and I'm definitely going to be going to them to redesign my website. I wouldn't go to anyone else! 😁
★★★★★

Caroline Schofield, founder of CazFit, South Africa

King Code completely changed my life. They built a customized website for me from scratch. We met on zoom for the first time and I briefly told them what my vision was and they completely made it come true. They also helped me come up with content ideas for my Instagram which I am so thankful for. I honestly wouldn’t choose anyone else to build my website and be a part of my team! ❤️
★★★★★

- Lisette Munro, Owner of Lisette Munro, The USA

Candy and Jonty have not only gone above and beyond to make my website exactly how I want it, but they are just absolute gems to work with. Candy understood my vision immediately and gave great input to make it even better. She quickly made an aesthetically beautiful website that I’m so proud to call my own. Candy and Jonty are amazing people who turn your dreams into reality!
★★★★★

- Leah Morans, Co-Founder of Moving Morans, The USA
